title: Players with most appearances for Manchester United 2019
summary: This bar chart has 21 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Number of appearances in each Month on the y axis.
The Number of appearances is appeared to be the highest at Month Ryan Giggs and lowest at Month Gary Pallister.
There is a difference of 526.0 between the maximum Month Ryan Giggs and minimum Month Gary Pallister.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Number of appearances in the y axis.
Month Ryan Giggs has the highest Number of appearances and Gary Pallister has the lowest Number of appearances.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 21 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Number of appearances in each Month on the y axis.
The Number of appearances is appeared to be the highest at Month Ryan Giggs and lowest at Month Gary Pallister.
There is a difference of 526.0 between the maximum Month Ryan Giggs and minimum Month Gary Pallister.
max_summary: This bar chart has 21 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Number of appearances in each Month on the y axis.
The Number of appearances is highest at Month Ryan Giggs and lowest at Month Gary Pallister.
The second highest Number of appearances is appeared to be the Month Sir Bobby Charlton.
There is a difference of 526.0 between the maximum Month Ryan Giggs and minimum Month Gary Pallister.
Number of appearances at Month Ryan Giggs is 963.0 , second place is Sir Bobby Charlton at 758.0, and thirdly is Paul Scholes at 718.0.
The Number of appearances has lowered over the past 21 Months.
The Month Gary Pallister tends to be 1.76 percent lower than average.
The Number of appearances is 11496.0 if we add up values of all Months.
